resources.string: Power resides where men believe it resides. It\'s a trick, a shadow on the wall. And, a very small man can cast a very large shadow
All my life men like you have sneered at me, and all my life I\'ve been knocking men like you into the dust.
You need to take your enemy\'s side if you are going to see things the way they do. -Tyrion Lannister
Buddy, may your evening be filled with all the best and beautiful things of life
